data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
SELECT Com.Images,DocumentNo,YEAR(CONVERT(DATE,Pro.CreatedOn)) YearProbation,dbo.getDateKH(Pro.CreatedOn) CreatedOn, Sta.OthAllName,Sta.Signature,Pos.SecDescription SecPosition,Dep.SecDescription SecDepartment,Sec.SecDescription SecSection, dbo.getDateKH(Pro.Probation) EndDate,ProType.Description,ProType.SecDescription,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), Pro.CreatedOn, 112) AS RequestYear, (SELECT TOP 1 OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=Pro.EmpCode ) As EmpNAME, (SELECT TOP 1 dbo.getDateKH(M.StartDate) FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=Pro.EmpCode ) As StartDate, dbo.KHR_NUM(NewSalary)NewSalaryKH,dbo.KHR_NUM(OldSalary)OldSalaryKH,OldSalary,NewSalary,Pro.ProbationType,
dbo.getDateKH(GETDATE()) DateNow, (SELECT TOP 1 StampRejectImage FROM SYHRSetting)RejectImage, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(EX.Approver) FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel in(@APROLEVEL+1))>0THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)N_A, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))Status1, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END))Status2, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END))Status3,
dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate1, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate2, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate3,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName3,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))sign1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))sign2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=Pro.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=Pro.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))sign3 FROM HREFReqProbation Pro LEFT JOIN HREFProbationType ProType on Pro.ProbationType=ProType.Code LEFT JOIN HRStaffProfile Sta on Sta.EmpCode=Pro.CreatedBy LEFT JOIN HRCompany Com on Sta.CompanyCode=Com.Company LEFT JOIN HRPosition Pos on Pro.Position=Pos.Code LEFT JOIN HRDepartment Dep on Pro.Department=Dep.Code LEFT JOIN HRSection Sec on Pro.Section=Sec.Code WHERE Pro.DocumentNo= @DocumentNo;
